content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: cooked_chicken
inventory=[{"type": "allium", "quantity": 33, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 14, "index": 20}, {"type": "red_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 4, "index": 22}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 46, "index": 24}, {"type": "detector_rail", "quantity": 40, "index": 25}, {"type": "chicken", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 30, "index": 35}, {"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 30, "index": 41}, {"type": "cornflower", "quantity": 18, "index": 42}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft cooked_chicken. Cooked chicken requires placing 1 chicken and 1 fuel (eg., cobblestone) side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to smelt the chicken from slot 26 into the crafting grid.
act: smelt from slot 26 to slot 11 with quantity 1
